remarks: Series sum with index set a subset of the upper integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement:
zsum.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
zsum.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
zsum.3 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ Z ) $.
zsum.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = if ( k e. A , B , 0 ) ) $.
zsum.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
zsum $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B = ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
